messages.subject: Re: new Samurai Archives Blog
messages.msgSnippet: ... And if anyone wants to subscribe to the RSS feed, this is the RSS feed URL: http://www.bloglines.com/blog/samuraiarchives/rss
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Kitsuno"
<samurai-listowner@s...> wrote:
>
> We've decided to post updates and current projects to the new Samurai
> Archives blog. Since it is a blog, it should be much more animated
> than the simple "recent updates page", so feel free to check it out
> now and then: http://www.bloglines.com/blog/samuraiarchives
>

And if anyone wants to subscribe to the RSS feed, this is the RSS feed
URL: http://www.bloglines.com/blog/samuraiarchives/rss

messages.subject: new Samurai Archives Blog
messages.msgSnippet: We ve decided to post updates and current projects to the new Samurai Archives blog. Since it is a blog, it should be much more animated than the simple
messages.messageBody:
We've decided to post updates and current projects to the new Samurai
Archives blog. Since it is a blog, it should be much more animated
than the simple "recent updates page", so feel free to check it out
now and then: http://www.bloglines.com/blog/samuraiarchives
